  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205287</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Knowledge Is Power - Use It Wisely</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissen Ist Energie - Verwenden Sie Sie Klug</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Connaissance Est Puissance - Utilisez-La 
Sagement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Conhecimento É Potência - Use-a Sàbiamente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Conoscenza È Potenza - Usila Saggiamente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γνώση είναι δύναμη - την χρησιμοποιήστε σοφά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Conocimiento Es Potencia - Utilícela 
Sabiamente</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students will work in teams to do further research on the ethics issues presented in the documentary The Nobel: Visions of Our Century.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion arbeiten Kursteilnehmer in den 
Teams, um weitere Forschung auf den Ethikausgaben zu tun, die im 
Dokumentarfilm das Nobel dargestellt werden: Anblicke unseres 
Jahrhunderts.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants travailleront 
dans les équipes pour faire davantage de recherche sur les questions 
d'éthique présentées dans le documentaire le Nobel : Visions 
de notre siècle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes trabalharão nas 
equipes para fazer uma pesquisa mais adicional sobre as edições do 
ethics apresentadas no documentary o Nobel: Visões de nosso 
século.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi lavoreranno in 
squadre per fare ulteriore ricerca sulle edizioni di etica presentate 
nel documentary il Nobel: Visioni del nostro secolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές θα εργαστούν στις 
ομάδες για να κάνουν την περαιτέρω έρευνα για τα ζητήματα ηθικής
που παρουσιάζονται στο ντοκιμαντέρ το Νόμπελ: Οράματα του 
αιώνα μας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes trabajarán en 
equipos para hacer la investigación adicional sobre las ediciones del
ética presentadas en el documentary el Nobel: Visiones de 
nuestro siglo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

  </description>
